thread.section_title: Colonial Properties Cabin & Resort Rentals Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Colonial Properties Cabin & Resort Rentals | smokymtndreams.com
thread.title: Visitor
thread.title_full: Colonial Properties Cabin & Resort Rentals reviewed by Visitor

author: Visitor
title: Visitor
text: The cabin was beautiful and well decorated. It was nice to have 3 floors to allow for privacy. The only cons were the water heater did not maintain enough hot water for 7 people and there was other cabin renters parking in front of our cabin making it hard to get access to our cabin. This was very frustrating to find when we checked in and did not have a place to park in front of the cabin.
